xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.1 Hetuduka, Kusalattika » 1.1.2 Akusalapada » 1.1.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
42.
68Hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
43.
69Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava…pe…  noavigate nava. (Paccanīyaṃ.)
70Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ.)
71Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ.)
72(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
